parameters.name: AssociationStatus
parameters.description:
The association status. Valid values:

*   Associating: The entity is being associated.
*   Associated: The entity is associated.
*   Failed: The entity fails to be associated.
*   Disassociating: The entity is being disassociated.
*   Disassociated: The entity is disassociated.

>  The system deletes the records of entities in the `Failed` or `Disassociated` state within 48 hours to 96 hours.

parameters.name: AssociationType
parameters.description:
The association type. Valid values:

*   Resource
*   Target

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to return for a single request.

Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The `token` that is used to initiate the next request if the response of the current request is truncated. You can use the token to initiate another request and obtain the remaining records.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource.

>  This parameter is unavailable if you set the `AssociationType` parameter to `Target`.

parameters.name: ResourceShareIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of the resource shares.

Valid values of N: 1 to 5. This indicates that a maximum of five resource shares can be specified at a time.

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description:
The ID of the principal.

>  This parameter is unavailable if you set the `AssociationType` parameter to `Resource`.
